title: If I write good jingles, how can I make them reach companies or advertising companies? - Quora

response.answer_text: Making your jingle reach companies is just great!  For that all you need to do is make your tune go viral. That's the main point which will help you connect with the officials of the company.Upload your tune in social media and/or on the company's page letting them know you have something for them in their best interest.Make others around you listen to your jingle. If they like,they will definitely recommend their acquaintances to listen to your tune. In this way you will know how good your jingle is and you will get a good exposure for your motive.Mail your jingle to the company thereby attaching the file to your mail.I hope it helps :)
